overview: Rense Jonk (1975) became senior investment manager on 1 January 2008. In 2006 and 2007, Rense was responsible for the valuation practice at BDO Corporate Finance, where he worked from 1995. During that period, he was involved with mergers, acquisitions and valuation issues. Rense graduated in Business Economics from the University of Amsterdam. At NAVITAS, he is involved with both private and listed companies.
